scripts.prepare-open-api-for-all-published-sdks: npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=ruby && npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=java && npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=php
scripts.generate-sdk-ruby: npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=ruby;rm -r ./sdks/ruby/lib;rm -r ./sdks/ruby/docs;openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=ruby;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/ruby/OpenAPI.json -g ruby -o ./sdks/ruby -t ./mustache-templates/ruby-client --additional-properties=gemName=VoucherifySdk,gemVersion=6.0.0
scripts.generate-sdk-java: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=java;rm -r ./sdks/java/src/main;rm -r ./sdks/java/docs;rm -r ./sdks/java/api;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=java;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/java/OpenAPI.json -g java -o ./sdks/java -t mustache-templates/java --additional-properties=VoucherifySdk,artifactVersion=13.0.0,testOutput=./tmp/java/generated-tests,artifactId=voucherify-java-sdk,disallowAdditionalPropertiesIfNotPresent=false,groupId=io.voucherify.client,apiPackage=io.voucherify.client.api,modelPackage=io.voucherify.client.model,invokerPackage=io.voucherify.client; rm -rf ./tmp/java/generated-tests;
scripts.generate-sdk-php: rm -r ./sdks/php/src;openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=php;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/php/OpenAPI.json -g php-nextgen -o ./sdks/php -t ./mustache-templates/php-nextgen
scripts.generate-sdk-python: rm -r ./sdks/python/voucherify_client;npx openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 7.0.1;npm run prepare-open-api-for-sdk -- --language=python;npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./reference/readonly-sdks/python/OpenAPI.json -g python -o ./sdks/python -t ./mustache-templates/python --additional-properties=packageName=voucherify_client,packageVersion=1.0.0
scripts.generate-sdks: concurrently "npm run generate-sdk-ruby" "npm run generate-sdk-java" "npm run generate-sdk-php" "npm run generate-sdk-python"
scripts.test-sdks: concurrently "cd ./sdks/ruby && docker build -t ruby .;docker run --rm ruby" "cd ./sdks/java && docker build -t java .;docker run --rm java" "cd ./sdks/php && docker build -t php .;docker run -p 5050:5050 --rm php" "cd ./sdks/python && docker build -t python .;docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app python"
scripts.test-ruby-sdk: concurrently "cd ./sdks/ruby && docker build --no-cache -t ruby . && docker run --rm ruby"
scripts.pre-commit: npm run generate-endpoints-coverage-doc -- --generateFor=default && npm run fix-schemas-with-refs && npm run create-open-api-version-to-upload && npm run build-update-md-tables-from-openapi && npm run prepare-open-api-for-all-published-sdks && npm run build-production-openapi
